model apply change index worktree doe call git anymore load data diff initializer take two parameter filename relative path file diffed actual text diff without diff header initializer new standalone function _parse_diff convert diff text list _diffhunk object stored instance hunk attribute diffparser two method first generate_patch take index first last line diff include patch along optional boolean flag indicating reverse patch generated return string containing patch including diff header generated using filename passed initializer none resulting patch would change anything second method simple wrapper around generate_hunk method take single line index along reverse flag generates patch using hunk containing specified line next command class sole user diffparser class update initializer replace offset selection_text parameter indicating start content selection respectively three parameter indicating index first last selected line line containing cursor selection along boolean indicating actually text selected differentiate selection single line versus selection merge functionality old method method method first construct diffparser instance passing filename diff text model has_selection attribute call either generate_patch method diffparser instance depending whether selection finally resulting patch none writes temporary file passed either model apply_diff method depending operation performed revert vs. stage unstage log status update model lastly update diffeditor widget class add selected_lines method return index first last selected line line containing cursor selection update method use new method along has_selection method pas appropriate line index has_selection flag constructing command also reflect change replace staged parameter
